title: Learn about the interpretation of dreaming about being pregnant according to Ibn Sirin.

preview.text: Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant I have many vows to the owner of the dream, knowing that dream interpreters have realized that the dream also carries a number of negative meanings in some cases, and today through the Egyptian website, we will discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail for single, pregnant, married and divorced women. Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant by Ibn Sirin Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant The dream of being pregnant in a dream symbolizes the conclusion of a new love relationship in the near future. The success or failure of this relationship depends on the dreamer's own circumstances. Seeing pregnancy in a dream indicates the number of responsibilities that fall on the dreamer's shoulders, as he feels that he cannot live properly. 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');As for seeing pregnancy in a dream, according to what Ibn Shaheen said, this means that you will gain a lot of money in the coming period. She will be able to get rid of these problems and her life will be filled with happiness and pleasure. Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant is a sign that life will become more stable in addition to being able to achieve all of her goals and ambitions, otherwise natural. Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing pregnancy in a dream indicates a set of good qualities and morals. The dream also symbolizes the fear of the Almighty God and closeness to him through righteous deeds. Seeing pregnancy also symbolizes success in studies and there will be a bright future in life.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');But if the dreamer feels fear and anxiety all the time, the dream shows that she will be able to get rid of all anxiety and fear in her life, in addition to finding a solution to all the problems and difficulties she faces. As for the knowledge seeker who dreams that she is pregnant without giving birth, this indicates that she will face a lot. And the difficulties she faces in her academic life. As for those going through a financial crisis, the dream warns her that she will be able to survive that crisis and God Almighty will compensate her with abundant commission. Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant for a Single Woman If an unmarried girl sees herself pregnant in a dream, this foretells that her life will be filled with many blessings and good things in her life. She will face many difficulties and problems in her life, but they will not last long and she will be able to face them. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing pregnancy in a single woman's dream is a good omen that she will be addressed in the coming period and that her married life in the future will be more stable. Therefore, it is best to direct her energy to helping the people close to her.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant for a Married Woman The interpreters of interpretation say that the dream that I am pregnant with a married woman and gave birth to children in reality indicates that kindness and livelihood will overwhelm her life, in addition to being able to achieve all her dreams, even if the problems are the way. And the crises are so many that it is difficult to deal with them. Pregnancy in a married woman's dream is a sign that her relationship with her husband will improve significantly and the differences between them will be removed, at least in the coming period.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant for a Pregnant Woman Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is a sign that she is suffering from a lot of psychological pressure in her life and cannot deal with it. She is also thinking about pregnancy and childbirth all the time and feels excessive pressure. Pregnancy in a pregnant woman's dream is an indicator that her lifestyle is changing significantly after childbirth. As for those who saw that she was pregnant with a male in her dream, it is good that she gives birth to a male, and the same interpretation applies to a woman's pregnancy in a dream, as it also indicates that she will give birth. Giving birth to a female. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant and gives birth to children in reality, this is also a good omen for abundant nutrition and the good that will happen in the dreamer's life. Ibn Shaheen had a different opinion when interpreting this dream, as he mentioned that the dreamer's husband will take an important position and benefit his life together. With great benefit. Dream Interpretation: I am Pregnant from a Divorced Woman The dream of seeing me pregnant in a dream for a divorced woman is an indicator of an urgent desire to forget the past and start a new and better beginning towards her future. The dream also symbolizes that she will be able to get rid of all the problems and seizures that she has been suffering from for a long time. Ibn Sirin believes that pregnancy in a divorced woman's dream is a sign of an opportunity to return to her former husband, and their lives will improve together significantly.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');The dream suggests that she will direct all her energy to caring for her children and not making them feel deprived of her, and if there are no children, this foretells that she will find a job in the near future with a high salary. In addition, she will be able to achieve all her goals and improve her living conditions. Dream of pregnancy in a dream. The divorced woman symbolizes the possibility of marrying a man who compensates her for all the difficulties she has gone through. The Egyptian website is the largest specialized website in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write Dream interpretation Egyptian website on Google and get the right interpretations.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? Also, to achieve financial stability. And securing enough funds to meet all needs. I am pregnant and I had a miscarriage Pregnancy and miscarriage in a dream are a sign that the dreamer will be betrayed and disappointed by someone very close to him. Miscarriage in a dream is one of the unfavorable dreams that indicates exposure to a major crisis that is difficult to deal with. The dream also indicates a large financial loss.
